attributes.action: Politicians need to step in and deescalate the issue in Afghanistan immediately.
attributes.additional_details: The government needs to support Afghanistan as the Afghan people need its support and aid, it is facing a huge humanitarian crisis, and little is being done by the UK politicians and its allies.
attributes.background: The UK and its allies need to de-escalate in the face of increasing violence regarding the matter as soon as possible as well as fund, aid and support any refugees who have fled the war in the last two decades when they arrive in any western country.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Help the people of Afghanistan: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/594723

Redeploy UK Forces to Afghanistan to protect the citizens against the Taliban: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/594823
